name: Hypnosis
passiveSkills: Inflict 1 Physical Burn on self for 1 turn at the start of your turn
Increase SPECIAL stat by +15% for each negative effect currently on you at the start of your turn
Inflict Stun or Perfect Stun on a random enemy for each instance of any Blind or Heal Block Effects on any enemy after each action
Inflict Passive or Perfect Disable on a random enemy for each instance of Perfect Corruption, Silence, or Punishment on each enemy after you attack
Transform Trap on all allies into Golden Trap for the duration of battle at the start of your turn.
